Replying to @netzwerg_au 2018-10-29 00:01
@netzwerg_au @liamosaur @Netlify It means that some of the assets loaded by some of the pages are being served from an http resource even though the page itself is being served over the more secure https. But a chain is only was strong as its weakest link, so you want to try to avoid this by using https for all
